column4: hey guys, ok i downloaded a phew games with the package manager and bits of software and im wondering, when u download a package or game, or program. with software center, or package manager, does it store the packages anywhere on the pc? so u can back it up and not have to redownload it
it could be compiz using a back buffer that is clearing up the tearing. you could see if the tearing comes back if you do metacity --replace
nobody is using wayland at this point
